languages.text: "По делу леди Моллес-Секандас Вольный Торговец принял{mf||а} решение признать легитимными оба заключенных ею брака, заставив сожительствовать с обоими супругами. В результате семейная междоусобица вылилась в кровавую расправу, обезглавившую два дворянских рода, а главное — оставившую важные для Империума производства без компетентных управляющих".

"The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was to declare both her marriages valid, which forced her to live with both her husbands under one roof. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."
languages.original_text: "По делу леди Моллес-Секандас Вольный Торговец принял{mf||а} решение признать легитимными оба заключенных ею брака, заставив сожительствовать с обоими супругами. В результате семейная междоусобица вылилась в кровавую расправу, обезглавившую два дворянских рода, а главное — оставившую важные для Империума производства без компетентных управляющих".

traits.locale_text: "The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was to declare both her marriages valid, which forced her to live with both her husbands under one roof. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

"The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was a blasphemous permission for {mf|his|her} noble subjects to take several spouses. More exactly, the decision had come from Jae Heydari, a criminal from a barbarian world whose opinion the Rogue Trader concurred with."

"The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was to declare both her marriages valid, which forced her to live with both her husbands under one roof. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

"The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was a blasphemous permission for {mf|his|her} noble subjects to take several spouses. More exactly, the decision had come from Jae Heydari, a criminal from a barbarian world whose opinion the Rogue Trader concurred with."

"The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was to declare both her marriages valid, which forced her to live with both her husbands under one roof. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

"The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was to declare both her marriages valid, which forced her to live with both her husbands under one roof. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

"The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was to declare both her marriages valid, which forced her to live with both her husbands under one roof. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

"The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was to declare both her marriages valid, which forced her to live with both her husbands under one roof. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

languages.text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat im Fall von Lady Molles-Secundas verfügt, dass beide Eheschließungen gültig sind, wodurch sie gezwungen war, mit ihren beiden Ehemännern unter einem Dach zu leben. Was als Familienfehde begonnen hatte, mündete dadurch in ein Massaker, das zwei Adelshäuser ihrer Führung und für das Imperium wichtige Produktionsanlagen einer kompetenten Verwaltung beraubte."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was to declare both her marriages valid, which forced her to live with both her husbands under one roof. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat im Fall von Lady Molles-Secundas verfügt, dass beide Eheschließungen gültig sind, wodurch sie gezwungen war, mit ihren beiden Ehemännern unter einem Dach zu leben. Was als Familienfehde begonnen hatte, mündete dadurch in ein Massaker, das zwei Adelshäuser ihrer Führung und für das Imperium wichtige Produktionsanlagen einer kompetenten Verwaltung beraubte."

"Das Urteil {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} im Fall Lady Molles-Secundas kam der blasphemischen Erlaubnis für {mf|seine|ihre} Untertanen gleich, sich mehrere Partner zu nehmen. Präziser gesagt, kam die Entscheidung von Jae Heydari, einer Verbrecherin von einer Barbarenwelt, deren Meinung {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} teilte."

languages.text: « Par son jugement, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a rendu valides les deux mariages de dame Molles-Secundas, la contraignant à vivre avec ses deux époux sous le même toit. En conséquence, ce qui n'était à l'origine qu'une simple querelle familiale s'est soldé par un massacre qui a décapité deux maisons nobles. Pire encore, des fabriques d'une importance capitale pour l'Imperium se retrouvent maintenant privées de responsables compétents. »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was to declare both her marriages valid, which forced her to live with both her husbands under one roof. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

traits.locale_text: « Par son jugement, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a rendu valides les deux mariages de dame Molles-Secundas, la contraignant à vivre avec ses deux époux sous le même toit. En conséquence, ce qui n'était à l'origine qu'une simple querelle familiale s'est soldé par un massacre qui a décapité deux maisons nobles. Pire encore, des fabriques d'une importance capitale pour l'Imperium se retrouvent maintenant privées de responsables compétents. »

« La décision {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} lors du jugement de dame Molles-Secundas n'était qu'une couverture pour permettre à ses nobles sujets de prendre plusieurs conjoints. Cette décision venait en réalité de Jae Heydari, une criminelle venue d'un monde de barbares, qui partageait l'avis {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: “行商浪人在莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人一案中，宣布她的两场婚姻都是正当合法的，而莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人也不得不与两位丈夫生活在同一个屋檐下。在此之后，这场家族之间的恩怨很快升级成了全面战争，两个贵族家族也因此毁于一旦。更糟糕的是，对帝国至关重要的制造工厂，也因为这场争端而失去了称职的管理者。”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was to declare both her marriages valid, which forced her to live with both her husbands under one roof. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人在莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人一案中，宣布她的两场婚姻都是正当合法的，而莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人也不得不与两位丈夫生活在同一个屋檐下。在此之后，这场家族之间的恩怨很快升级成了全面战争，两个贵族家族也因此毁于一旦。更糟糕的是，对帝国至关重要的制造工厂，也因为这场争端而失去了称职的管理者。”
“行商浪人在审判莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人一案中，允许{mf|他|她}的贵族臣民拥有多位配偶。这样的决定是对帝国律法的亵渎。确切地说，这个决定是由婕伊·海达利提出的，这个人是来自某个野蛮世界的罪犯，而行商浪人同意了这个罪犯的观点。”

languages.text: «La resolución {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente en el caso de lady Molles-Secundas consistió en declarar válidos sus dos matrimonios, lo cual la obligó a convivir con ambos cónyuges bajo un mismo techo. Como resultado, lo que empezó como un conflicto familiar se convirtió en una masacre que no solo ha decapitado a dos casas nobles, sino que, lo que es peor, ha dejado instalaciones de manufactura de gran importancia para el Imperium sin gestión competente».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was to declare both her marriages valid, which forced her to live with both her husbands under one roof. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

traits.locale_text: «La resolución {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente en el caso de lady Molles-Secundas consistió en declarar válidos sus dos matrimonios, lo cual la obligó a convivir con ambos cónyuges bajo un mismo techo. Como resultado, lo que empezó como un conflicto familiar se convirtió en una masacre que no solo ha decapitado a dos casas nobles, sino que, lo que es peor, ha dejado instalaciones de manufactura de gran importancia para el Imperium sin gestión competente».

«El veredicto de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en el caso de lady Molles-Secundas fue otorgar un permiso blasfemo a sus súbditos nobles para que tomen varios cónyuges. Para ser precisos, la sugerencia vino de parte de Jae Heydari, una criminal de un mundo bárbaro, con cuya opinión se mostró de acuerdo {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーは、レディ・モレス・セクンダスの裁定において、彼女の二つの結婚を双方とも有効と認め、一つ屋根の下で二人の夫と共に暮らすことを命じました。その結果、当初は家族間の争いに過ぎなかったものが激化し、二つの貴族家が断絶する惨事へと発展したのです。さらに最悪の事態として、帝国にとって重要な製造施設は有能な管理者を失うことになりました」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was to declare both her marriages valid, which forced her to live with both her husbands under one roof. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーは、レディ・モレス・セクンダスの裁定において、彼女の二つの結婚を双方とも有効と認め、一つ屋根の下で二人の夫と共に暮らすことを命じました。その結果、当初は家族間の争いに過ぎなかったものが激化し、二つの貴族家が断絶する惨事へと発展したのです。さらに最悪の事態として、帝国にとって重要な製造施設は有能な管理者を失うことになりました」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in Leydi Molles-Secundas davasındaki kararı, her iki evliliğin de geçerli olduğunu bildirdi. Bu da Leydi Molles-Secundas'ı, her iki kocasıyla da aynı çatı altında yaşamaya zorladı. Sonuç olarak aile içi bir çatışma olarak başlayan olay, yalnızca iki soylu aileyi ortadan kaldırmakla kalmayıp İmparatorluk için büyük önem taşıyan üretim tesislerini yetkin idarecilerden yoksun bırakan bir katliama dönüştü."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's ruling in the Lady Molles-Secundas case was to declare both her marriages valid, which forced her to live with both her husbands under one roof. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir'in Leydi Molles-Secundas davasındaki kararı, her iki evliliğin de geçerli olduğunu bildirdi. Bu da Leydi Molles-Secundas'ı, her iki kocasıyla da aynı çatı altında yaşamaya zorladı. Sonuç olarak aile içi bir çatışma olarak başlayan olay, yalnızca iki soylu aileyi ortadan kaldırmakla kalmayıp İmparatorluk için büyük önem taşıyan üretim tesislerini yetkin idarecilerden yoksun bırakan bir katliama dönüştü."

"Hür Tacir'in Leydi Molles-Secundas davasındaki kararı, soylulara birden fazla eş alma izni vermesiyle sapkınlık olarak değerlendirildi. Daha da kötüsü, bu karar barbar bir dünyadan gelen suçlu Jae Heydari'nin görüşüne dayanılarak alınmıştı."
